effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move is super-effective against the water type. The target’s other type will affect damage as usual. If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move is super-effective against the water type. The target’s other type will affect damage as usual. If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. This move is super-effective against the water type. The target’s other type will affect damage as usual. If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
